5.56 x 45mm NATO.name: 5.56 x 45mm NATO
5.56 x 45mm NATO.description: NATO military reference round using during combat operations.

7.62 x 54mm Russian.name: 7.62 x 54mm Russian
7.62 x 54mm Russian.description: Eastern Bloc military reference round using during combat operations.

.50 BMG.name: .50 BMG
.50 BMG.description: Sniper rounds used for long-distance pacification.

7.62×51mm NATO.name: 7.62×51mm NATO
7.62×51mm NATO.description: Has been used in machine guns by the United States Armed Forces since the late-1970s.

Crossette.name: Crossette
Crossette.description: An effect that splits in the sky, for example a coloured star which then splits into four or five other coloured stars.

Hummer.name: Hummer
Hummer.description: A firework shell or projectile that makes a “humming” noise.

Sparklers.name: Sparklers
Sparklers.description: A firework suitable for children aged 8 and up.

Peony.name: Peony
Peony.description: Well-used term to describe an effect which is essentially an expanding sphere of stars.

Fragmentation grenade.name: Fragmentation grenade
Fragmentation grenade.description: These grenades are used to produce casualties by high-velocity projection of fragments.

Illuminating grenade.name: Illuminating grenade
Illuminating grenade.description: This grenade is used to provide illumination of terrain and targets.

Chemical grenade.name: Chemical grenade
Chemical grenade.description: These grenades are used for incendiary, screening, signaling, training, or riot-control.

Offensive grenade.name: Offensive grenade
Offensive grenade.description: This grenade is used for blast effect.

Practice and Training grenade.name: Practice and Training grenade
Practice and Training grenade.description: These grenades are for training personnel in use, care and handling of service grenades.

Nonlethal grenade.name: Nonlethal grenade
Nonlethal grenade.description: This grenade is used for diversionary purposes or when lethal force is not desired.

Dynamite.name: Dynamite
Dynamite.description: n explosive made of nitroglycerin, sorbents (such as powdered shells or clay) and stabilizers.

Composition C-4.name: Composition C-4
Composition C-4.description: C-4 has a texture similar to modeling clay and can be molded into any desired shape.

M18A1 Claymore mine.name: M18A1 Claymore mine
M18A1 Claymore mine.description: a directional anti-personnel mine used by the United States Armed Forces.

Semtex.name: Semtex
Semtex.description: a general-purpose plastic explosive used in commercial blasting and demolition.
